data.message: Well, I've tried to contact Facebook by messenger on numerous occasions because all of my synced photos are lost (and they aren't in memories either). I lost all of my pictures from the birth of my son and about the first 2 years of his life. No response from you or from memories. Some help would be nice

replies.message: Hi, Jennifer. Photo syncing was a service that allowed you to back up photos from your phone to a private folder on Facebook. As of July 7, 2016, private photo syncing on Facebook was disabled, and we stopped supporting storage for these private backup folders. If you downloaded and logged into the Moments app, your photos are available to you there. -Monica

Facebook I logged into moments quite some time ago and all of the photos weren't there. I started contacting both Facebook and Moments longneck before July 16, 2016 and never received a reply. So you're telling me these photos are just gone?
It was actually March 24, 2016 the first time I contacted you
And I've gotten no type of response from Moments at all and have sent them several messages
